title: Home Page Load and Render
description: Verify the Home Page loads correctly and all key components render as expected on supported browsers.

steps.description: Navigate to the Home Page URL
Confirm that the main banner, navigation menu, and footer are visible and rendered
Validate responsive layout on desktop and mobile screen sizes
Verify no JavaScript or rendering errors occur during page load

title: Shop Page Product Listing Display
description: Verify the Shop Page displays a comprehensive catalog of luxury baby strollers with correct details.

steps.description: Navigate to the Shop Page
Check that product tiles/cards display product names, images, prices, and brief descriptions
Ensure product listings update dynamically if the backend catalog changes
Confirm pagination or infinite scroll (if applicable) loads additional products without errors

title: Product Details Page Display and Accuracy
description: Verify detailed product information page shows accurate data for selected strollers including images, specs, and pricing.

steps.description: Select a product from the Shop Page to open the Product Details Page
Verify product images load correctly and can be viewed in a gallery or zoom
Check all product specifications and price details match expected backend data
Validate presence and functionality of 'Add to Cart' button

title: Shopping Cart Add, Modify, and Remove Items
description: Verify that users can add products to the cart, update quantities, and remove items with correct updates reflecting in the UI.

steps.description: Add a product from the Product Details Page to the cart
Navigate to the Cart Page
Check if the added product appears with correct quantity, price, and total
Modify the quantity of the product in the cart
Confirm that the price and total update accordingly
Remove the product from the cart
Verify the cart is empty and an appropriate message is shown

title: Checkout Process with Valid Input
description: Ensure the checkout process completes successfully when valid payment and shipping details are entered.

steps.description: Add one or more products to the cart
Navigate to the Checkout Page
Enter valid shipping address and payment information
Submit the order
Verify order confirmation page is shown with order details
Confirm that backend order records are created correctly

title: Checkout Process with Invalid Input Handling
description: Verify the Checkout Page handles invalid or incomplete shipping/payment inputs with proper validation messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the Checkout Page with items in the cart
Enter invalid shipping address details (e.g., missing required fields)
Attempt to submit the order
Verify validation messages are displayed for the missing or invalid fields
Enter invalid payment information (e.g., incorrect card number format)
Attempt to submit the order
Confirm appropriate error messages prevent order submission

title: User Registration Happy Path
description: Ensure new users can successfully register with valid inputs and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the Registration Page
Enter valid user details including email and password
Submit the registration form
Confirm registration success message or redirection to login or dashboard

title: User Registration Input Validation Errors
description: Verify user registration form displays proper validation errors for invalid or missing fields.

steps.description: Navigate to the Registration Page
Submit the form with missing mandatory fields
Check the presence of validation error messages for required fields
Enter invalid email format
Attempt to submit the form
Verify error message for invalid email format
Enter passwords that do not meet complexity requirements or mismatch
Confirm password validation error messages appear correctly

title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a registered user can log in successfully with valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the Login Page
Enter valid registered email and password
Submit the login form
Confirm user is redirected to intended landing page or dashboard with personalized content

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that invalid login attempts show appropriate error messages without revealing sensitive information.

steps.description: Navigate to the Login Page
Enter incorrect email or password
Submit the login form
Check that an error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials

title: Admin Dashboard Access and Product Management
description: Verify authorized admin users can access the Admin Dashboard to add, update, and delete products without errors.

steps.description: Log in as an admin user
Navigate to the Admin Dashboard
Verify dashboard and product management UI load successfully
Add a new product with valid details
Confirm product appears in the catalog list
Edit an existing product's details
Verify changes are saved and displayed correctly
Delete a product
Ensure product is removed from the catalog

title: Admin Dashboard Order Management
description: Verify that admin users can view and update orders efficiently with no unauthorized access.

steps.description: Log in as an admin user
Navigate to the Orders section in the Admin Dashboard
Verify order list loads with accurate details
Update order status or details
Confirm updates save successfully without errors

title: Unauthorized Access Prevention for Admin Dashboard
description: Ensure that non-admin users cannot access or perform actions in the Admin Dashboard.

steps.description: Log in as a non-admin registered user
Attempt to navigate to the Admin Dashboard URL
Verify access is denied or redirected to a safe page
Attempt to perform admin operations via API or UI
Confirm actions are rejected and proper error messages are returned

title: Local Development Environment Setup Verification
description: Validate that the local development environment can be set up, built, and deployed successfully using provided instructions and tooling.

steps.description: Clone the project repository
Install dependencies using Bun package manager
Ensure that all dependencies install without errors
Run the development server locally
Confirm the app loads correctly in a browser
Build the project for production
Check build output completes without errors
Deploy the built version locally or to test environment
Verify the deployed app runs correctly

title: UI Responsiveness and Accessibility Compliance
description: Verify that UI components across pages are responsive and meet accessibility standards.

steps.description: Open key pages (Home, Shop, Product Details, Cart, Checkout, Login, Register, Admin Dashboard)
Test page layouts on multiple screen sizes (desktop, tablet, mobile)
Check for accessible elements: semantic markup, color contrast, keyboard navigation, and screen reader compatible labels
Verify no visual or layout breakage occurs when resizing or zooming the pages
